website_summaries.verdict: The most moisturizing lotion by Jergens, a trusted brand - and it comes at an affordable price.
pros: Made with a proprietary blend of vitamins and moisturizing ingredients that make dry hands soft and hydrated
Thick and creamy with a nice scent
Comes in several sizes including a value-priced 32-ounce bottle with a pump applicator
cons: Quality control issues noted, as some bottles arrived half-empty or damaged

customer_reviews.title: My feet say thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with dry cracking feet. I would even pay extra for callus remover every time I got a pedicure. And I had to have a pedicure every 2 weeks because my feet always felt rough. With this lotion, not only have I not needed the callus remover treatment anymore, my feel feel soooooo soft! I just hate it took me so long to find it! It really did HEAL my extra dry feet so yes, I definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Use all over your body--including your face.
customer_reviews.text: Love Jergen's Ultra Healing Extra Dry Skin Lotion. I used it for years and then, for some reason, didn't. I'd buy a brand and it would be too heavily scented, or greasy. When I saw this on Amazon it rang a bell---- so glad it did. Won't be buying any other in the future. You can use it all over your body.. including your face. Really does heal dry skin and once you have, it will keep it moist and looking good.
customer_reviews.author: ricracTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion, will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this lotion. Has a mild smell. It is thick but not overly thick. Moisturizes well, especially my feet which can crack on the heels. I used to use a special lotion just for my heels, but this lotion works great for them too, and almost never have a crack in my heel now. I don't even use this lotion every day about 3-4 times a week. Have used this lotion about 3 years
customer_reviews.author: MI

customer_reviews.title: Not a full bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and havent used it yet. I noticed from the lighting that the bottle is missing so much from the top! Shouldn't this be full? I tried to return or replace the lotion and it's not eligible to return. So I guess this is how I'm getting my satisfaction
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Defective bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my department at work is donating supplies to an underfunding school in my home town. When i received the box, all of the lotions were slippery because one of the bottles of lotion had a hole at the bottom of it. I did wipe all of them off but I am now one short. I like Jergens lotion but I will be one short of the amount that I need to give every student in the class that we adopted.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: The whole box was sealed properly, no spillage or broken seals. There were 24 bottles. Everything was as expected! Excited to add these to my little gift bags!
customer_reviews.author: Synthia N

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Jergens lotion all the time. When I saw the prices going up I switched to others and found some similar alternatives. So when I saw they had Jergens on sale again for a pretty good value, I didn’t to try out this newer variety. Let me tell you, they might promise ultra healing, but its just oil that rapidly disappears. I remember Jergen staying on and making you feel nice and smooth and refreshed. But this, it disappears way too fast and barely lasts. All smell and no moisturizing results. I wouldn’t recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My mom has used Jergens for years and has asked me to get her more as her currently supply has run low. I purchased this item for her at her request because it seems to be the only lotion she likes using as it helps heal her dry, cracked skin and I use it occasionally on my hands as my hands tend to be really dry and I have sensitive skin. This lotion works well and unless this version is discontinued, my mom will surely continue to use the same lotion for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: R34P3RX13

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It - I Do Not
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this 4 stars. In my humble opinion it does not moisturize the way I feel a lotion should. This is obviously a personal thing, because my husband feels as though it does. In fact, he has used ONLY this for years. He hates any other lotion I try to push on him. HA! This is his all time favorite - and it has to be the Ultra Healing. We both like the clean, fresh scent. There is no particular scent that is prominent. Perhaps it's best described as a musky, slight vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Silky
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most luxuriant creams I've ever come across. I always knew Jergens makes great products but I really needed something extra soothing for my beat up hands. We are washing at least ten times a day now and the soaps and rubbing and alcohol based sanitizers had the backs of my hands cracked and sore. One small dab of this cream soothes for hours! I don't know how to explain it......it just made my hands HAPPY. And I read that we do not want to have cracked skin as the current virus can linger in those openings. I love this lotion. Going to use it all over! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anna Aranda

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve found that works for hands that chap in Winter - Not greasy either.
customer_reviews.text: Only hand cream that works for for my dad‘s, our workers all our chapped cracked northern New England hands. They work outside in the winter and wears gloves but still their hands take a beating. And I just have very dry skin . My hands actually bleed in the winter up here in NH so I need a good hand cream. I’ve tried butters, hand balms, creams, from stores and natural stores and this is the only one that works for me and also my dad and his workers now use it too.
customer_reviews.author: H A Theodora

customer_reviews.title: Light scent and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years and do not see you stopping using it anytime soon. I have dry skin head to toe and this seems to work better on some areas more than others. I mainly using this product more than Jergens anti-aging, as that was discontinued. There is not an overbearingly strong sent to this lotion, which is a major selling point for me. Some products even if they are described as mild, have too strong of a scent that can trigger a headache. Some other lotions I have tried have a scent that smells like medicine to me and off-putting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, not a fan of the texture or scent
customer_reviews.text: You certainly get A LOT for the price, but I just am not a fan of how it smells or feels. It smells like a nursing home and feels like you spilled olive oil on your hands. I can't really stand the feeling of putting this on and going about my day....its so thick. You may like it, I just was not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion; poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion! One of my faves that my kids and husband enjoy using all the time. The one I got the lotion was not good.. it looked like it was popped open.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the lotion overall but I didn’t like how my package arrived! There was no bubble wrap to protect the top from being broken or shattered and of course my pump came broken along with lotion everywhere, now I always have to unscrew the entire top to get the lotion.. ANNOYING
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I go through a lot of hand cream and got tired of ordering a couple here or there or walking the aisles in the store. So I stocked up and bought this group of 24 which should last for quite awhile. Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: As a person who gets insanely dry hands, this is now the only lotion I use. After a while of searching for pleasant smelling lotions that don't really work, I finally came across this. It doesnt have any particular scent outside of general lotion smell but unlike other lotions it can actually moisturize my dry skin, even when my skin can get crazy bad at times.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Colella

customer_reviews.title: Not to sound like Dr. Seuss, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lotion. It's not too heavy,not too light. I can use it all over. The scent is just right. (OMG I sound like Dr. Seuss) And - this 32 oz bottle is a FRACTION of the cost of what it would be if I were to buy it in a local drug store. Sold!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: my hands feel AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare so my hands are also extremely dry and cracked. nothing, and I mean nothing was working ( not even jesus holy water) my co-worker suggested this lotion so I bought it and I can honestly say I am very impressed and get my hands are as smooth as a babys bottom now. thank you jergens! plus this bottle is as big as the Eiffel tower
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and bad smelling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and unfortunately they’re so sticky and unpleasantly scented that I’m giving them to someone else. This lotion never absorbs into my skin and just sits on top (mind you other lotions don’t do this). It also has a scent that I can’t put my finger on, but definitely is not what I want to smell like. Pass
customer_reviews.author: Jess Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: Used for years. Makes my skin stay soft and light fresh scent is great. Nice thick lotion that lasts all day for me.
customer_reviews.author: lioness85

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 pumps broken!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and give the product itself a 5. That said, when my 3 bottles arrived 2 of the pumps were broken, so I've had to tape them shut so they don't all dried out and will have to switch the pump from the one that works to the other 2. Not that big of a deal except these were for multiple members of my family so not the best efficiency. Packaging or shipping, not sure but what a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! Doesn’t smell like coconut or any other overwhelming smells. It just has a normal lotion smell and it doesn’t smell terrible. Super moisturizing and thick without being so thick you’re rubbing it for 5 minutes into your skin! My son has naturally dry skin and this is the only one I’ve tried that lasts all day and moisturizes his skin without clogging his pores. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: melissa g.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lotion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as giveaways in welcome baskets and they were perfect. I live in a dry climate and this is my favorite lotion for combating dry skin. Nice size for sticking in your purse or carry-on as well. They worked great as little gifts and I used the extras for myself-put one in my purse, one in my desk at work, and one in my car. Also good value for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Marts

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: First, I love the hand cream itself. However, the price is way too much for such a small container. And the packaging was overkill to say the least. One little tube came in a box strong enough to hold Tiffany glass and I had to use a serrated steak knife just to open it, only to find you could have fit four tubes inside. Way too big and wasteful. There's better deals and won't buy this size again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for your money. I tend to use it a couple of times per day at my office. It is not scented and any scent it does have dissipates after a few minutes (if that). It is available as a subscribe and save item which I have set to send every six months. If you are one that has issues with dry skin, I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: perfect for creating shoe boxes of love for our community homeless
customer_reviews.author: Galitty

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great for my dry hands in winter and you can still put on gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small travel tube of this lotion to keep in my backpack. Rather then constantly buying new tubes I just bought this big pump and have been refilling it. I love this lotion in general. It has a nice scent, drys down and doesn’t stay tacky, no shimmer. I use it daily in winter because the dry air + frequent hand washing leaves my hands super chapped. Unlike some hand lotion I can still if necessary immediately put on gloves if I need to head back into lab.

customer_reviews.title: Love My Jergens Ultra Healing
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Jergens since I was a kid, and that is a long time. This Jergens Ultra Healing is fantastic. It is very soothing and makes your skin supple to the touch. I have purchased very expensive lotions that do not compare. The price and size are an amazing value. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RocksNoSalt

customer_reviews.title: The only lotion I use on my face!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this lotion! It's not greasy and leave my skin nice and smooth for the day. I never have to feel as if I have to re apply it a million times. With having acne I don't break out more with jergans, it helps with redness and dryness!
customer_reviews.author: Yellieray

customer_reviews.title: Well received
customer_reviews.text: The lotion was great and I thought it will be possible to by something like lotion online. It was nice for to have get and I’m loving it. It was well package in the, but just a little lick because the top was open when I open the package. Overall, nothing was wrong other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Adedamola Bakare

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those people who cannot shower without following with a lotion chaser. I've tried more kinds than I can count. This product doesn't take much to cover my entire body without leaving a greasy finish, which is so great! The scent is mild and does not linger. I love the pump dispenser and one bottle of full body application has lasted months. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Ultra healing
customer_reviews.text: I have a very dry skin that looks like scales and peels of if I don’t moisture it, I’ve tried different creams and oils but none has been as effective as this ultra healing Jergens. This leaves my skin feeling smooth and moisturized. I most definitely will be buying this
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Product leaked all over inside the box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product quite a bit and never had this issue, but box arrived and lotion was all over the inside of the box- so much that the flinstone vitamins were no longer in their box because that box got so soggy. I love amazon but between some fake products and some arriving like this, im steering more towards just shopping the old fashion way and going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Elyce G

customer_reviews.title: Helped with Cracking Cuticles
customer_reviews.text: I've have very dry cuticles and this lotion is the only thing I've tried that has brought any relief to the problem. I tried cuticle cream and other lotions, but the dry, cracking skin returned usually the very next day. With regular use of this product, my hands are almost back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mira1234

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: My skin on my face literally went through hell on my last pregnancy and the only lotion that would help bring my skin back was jergens!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get quantity ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 24 pack received a 2 pack of trial size instead. What a RIP off. Ordered these for christmas office stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin, this lotion helps a lot. I used to buy it from Walmart but they increased the price. So i buy it from Amazon. It works really great. Unfortunately little bit lotion came out of the bottle during shipping. So it was little messy but the product is great that's why i am giving it 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Anik Islam

customer_reviews.title: All my friends and co-workers love this product
customer_reviews.text: I gave these lotion to my co-workers and friends. They were very glad to use them. Great gift. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: My go to lotion 🧴
customer_reviews.text: This lotion has a great texture and feel. Not runny, not greasy and not too thick. Also, the scent is pleasant, not strong and fades quickly. I can feel the difference on my skin after applying this lotion. My skin feels soften and looks moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion.
customer_reviews.text: My work is very taxing on my hands. I was constantly having dry cracked hands that nothing would touch. I was in another office and a lady there had a bottle of this so I tried it. It works GREAT! The scent isn't too strong and it leaves my hands nice and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on very dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets extremely dry in the winter and I have used many different moisturizers. This is my favorite body moisturizer. It even repairs very dried, cracked skin on the bottom of your feet in just a couple days. There's a scent, but it's light and doesn't linger.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have used this lotion for a long time and love the scent, moisture and longevity of Jergens Lotion. My one complaint is it was not package correctly and when I received my package almost 1/4 of the bottle leaked out into the box. But I will buy again..
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Broken dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love using Jergens and I always use Jergens. I’ve been using it for over six years now, and it feels amazing on my skin. However I have an issue with this seller. The dispenser knob of the body lotion is broken, and the seller still sold it to me like this. And I checked the box... the broken half is not in it. So it was definitely broken before it was put in the box for delivery, but it was still delivered to me like this. So I'm gonna have to give this product four stars for the poor handling.
customer_reviews.author: Tomike♡

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My ex-husband will tell you nothing makes me happy, but clearly this lotion has powers he does not. This lotion makes me happy....like really happy. It’s probably the best moisturizer I have ever used. 5 stars for the lotion, 1 star for him :)
customer_reviews.author: melissa1030

customer_reviews.title: Jergens Moisturizer really works!
customer_reviews.text: Jergens Ultra Healing Dry Skin Moisturizer is a fantastic product! I’ve been using hand sanitizer on a daily basis for some time now (even before the coronavirus pandemic), but it dries out my hands. This moisturizing cream really works, and you get a lot of it, so it’s a great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Spinoza

customer_reviews.title: This is very good lotion
customer_reviews.text: My hands tend to try out a lot, so getting this lotion was a very good decision. The bottle is large and a small amount of lotion goes a long way. Thus, the bottle can last a long time even for one who uses it often. I also found it convenient to use this as a refill for smaller lotion bottles that I can travel with. The lotion also works well as a lubricant for massages and therapy (I have a foot injury that I use therapy involving scraping for, and this lotion comes in handy here). Overall, this lotion is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Puskar8

customer_reviews.title: Good for your skin and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: It was highly recommend by a friend , been using it for more than a year now, no more dry itchy skin. I live in the North were the weather can be brutal in the winter. With this cream one less problem to worry about. I tell all my friends about it
customer_reviews.author: Jessy M.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: it has a fragrance scent I did not want though admittedly it is mild and dissipates fairly quickly. it does moisturize but doesn't last longer than others I've tried. Not bad. Just not what I wanted overall.
customer_reviews.author: JetBay

customer_reviews.title: Jergens is the best
customer_reviews.text: The best lotion out there, and I got a lot more than I expected! Great price, great quantity. Thanks a lot, Jergens. Frankly, apart from scent, I can’t tell the difference between each variety of Jergens, but they all cost the same, so I don’t really care. It’s all good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A lot of moisture and just a little scent
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and sticks to your skin nicely. Very moisturizing and stays in a long time. I use in my face as well and it doesn't leave it oily or give me a breakout. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. W.

customer_reviews.title: Most Effective Lotion
customer_reviews.text: Does the job of moisturizing the skin without a heavy or greasy feel. No annoying scent! Keeps my skin young looking. I've used this for years and have the softest skin and I believe it stops me from getting wrinkles on my body.
customer_reviews.author: Smile With Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be a 3 pack, actually a 1 pack (single tube)
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 tube for what was advertised as 3 pack. Works ok, absorbs quickly, but still kind of greasy. Has a fragrance, but I prefer no fragrance as it increases the chances of allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice within a month I Loved it so much and wanted to have extra on hand. My skin has been extra dry even almost 2 years after my chemo treatment and this stuff right here is golden!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good Lotion, but NOT Original Scent
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love original Jergens lotion, especially the cherry-almond scent. This Ultra Healing stuff seems to work, but the scent is very disappointing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mauser

customer_reviews.title: Best body lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to body lotion. The texture and scent are perfect. It doesn't leave you feeling greasy and is thick enough that it lasts all day. It soaks into the skin nicely even though it's heavy. I used this on my stomach the whole time I was pregnant too and I never got any stretch marks!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Got this after my hands became dry and were cracking, from frequent washing. I'm not a fan of lotion, but nothing else was working. This stuff is AMAZING! My skin immediately felt softer, and wasn't greasy and it lasted for hours. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Lbwehr

customer_reviews.title: My daily moisturizer cream
customer_reviews.text: this is my daily Moisturizer cream....i am using almost all of the seasons....this one is unscented...it keeps dry skin smooth all the day..I liked this cream.
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this lotion. Perfect size to keep with you
customer_reviews.text: This lotion absorbs into the skin quickly and completely! It is soothing, protecting, and healing! Usually lotions and creams promise me all kinds of things, but leave much of their promises unfulfilled by just hanging out on the surface of my skin and not doing anything to help my ultra dry, flaky, itchy, scaly skin! This one gets to work and does what it promises! It massages into the skin quickly and completely delivering immediate relief as well working to improve the condition of my skin. I highly recommend this lotion!! This is the perfect size to carry in a purse or briefcase or store in your work desk!
customer_reviews.author: cdgChgo

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: Great texture great quality and ket me smooth all day i will say its kind perfect so you only need is a little bit when I wash my hands I definitely felt it but other than that it was great
customer_reviews.author: Lateona

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion. It moisturizes really well and keeps my hand and feet from feeling dry for hours at a time. I keep it in lotion despensers all over my house.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hope

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift to put in teacher care packages. The only issue I had was that one of them was busted and spilled on the rest. That was it though.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda W.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tried so many others and this is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hand and body lotion. There has so much money spent for the fancy ones at the mall and boutique shops. This one is perfect for my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: J McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for winter
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lotion line I use during the fall and winter months. Works very well in my lotion warmer and keep skin moisturised all throughout the winter. Works very well on feet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Coffing

customer_reviews.title: It's great to have on the bathroom counter to slather on ...
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second bottle. It's great to have on the bathroom counter to slather on after a shower. The original scent is very pleasant and the lotion has been very good since I was young, a long time ago. It's still very good..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent with is not strong, also keep my skin moisture!! The 7 dollar for this huge bottle, I feel I can used more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great gift stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I bought a whole bunch of these for coworker gift bags. Great addition for bags offers. Common in picture is for reference size.
customer_reviews.author: Jswitt22

customer_reviews.title: Great cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cream, has a lot of product for the price and is very moisturizing! Will buy again once I run out
customer_reviews.author: Oneisha

customer_reviews.title: My go to lorion
customer_reviews.text: This is my fav lotion every! Lightweight on your skin and perfect for dry skin people, like literally the best I’ve tried ever! I use it nightly!
customer_reviews.author: Harlee Young

customer_reviews.title: cap broken on top
customer_reviews.text: POORLY packed and tab broken. need to unscrew each time if I am going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I love these products and I definitely recommend using
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Jergens products for years and my skin is healthy and smooth. I love these products and I definitely recommend using. It is quite the "bang" for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Kristle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its really good for cracked and dry heals and hand works amazing the smell it is lovely kinda feels like you freshly pampered your skin love it
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic with dry skin, I found this lotion to be very moisturizing if I apply it right out of the shower. It's quickly and easily absorbed and I like the scent. I also find that it lasts all day for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion for winter in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: My go-to lotion every winter. I love the smell and how effective this lotion is. I keep buying this thing over and over for years. I did try to use other brand but ended up getting back to Jergens every time.
customer_reviews.author: N P

customer_reviews.title: Instant smoothing for rough dry hands!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for very rough dry hands! Smooths and softens instantly and lasts! My whole family is hooked on this lotion for our hands now!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Grey

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing! Although my skin started feeling better immediately
customer_reviews.text: If you were to look in my bathroom cabinet you would find numerous bottles of body lotion ranging in price from $15.00 to $50.00. I would spend just about anything to help with my dry skin. My search is over. For $7.33 I purchased this lotion(that was the add-on price). It is amazing! Although my skin started feeling better immediately, after a week the results were fantastic. Would love to give it more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing with not greatest scent
customer_reviews.text: Great moisture with not so great scent. This is the longest lasting lotion I've used. The scent just isn't very pleasant not terrible though.
customer_reviews.author: shoptilldropamazon

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 boxes of 24 lotions each. 2 boxes were fine, but in the 3rd box a lotion was open and leaked all over several other lotions. It appears that it did not seal so it was cut open on the bottom. These are for healthcare workers that are putting themselves on the line during the pandemic. Could I please have a replacement? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Richert

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this jergens lotion especially this time of year. Its a very rich moisturizer and long lasting. It keeps my skin silky soft and smooth.its very hydrating too. Will definately reccomend to anyone with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion does a great job of moisturizing. A little bit goes a long way and this bottle is going to last me a long time. Definitely going to get the bang for my buck!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Part of a Goody Bag
customer_reviews.text: We bought these travel size lotions to put in Goody Bags for our local health care workers.
customer_reviews.author: Teri P.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Very good moisturizer for dry and cold climate. The best one ever and very reasonable. I have issues with dry skin because of the place I live in and this works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: The product is damaged- maybe by shipping. I’m not able to twist the pump - at least to use the product. The only option to use is to twist the cap open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your skin will make requests for this only
customer_reviews.text: Try it on damp skin and the product works even better (if at all possible!). Great for dry winter skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shade Pottinger

customer_reviews.title: Love the lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! So I ordered a box to put in gift bags for my coworkers! They loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bartie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lotion for low price.
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice clean just got out of the shower scent, but not strong. Keeps my skin from being soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sparklenerd

customer_reviews.title: Decent affordable lotion
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually likes this lotion. It is his favorite thus I have it on continual order every 2 months I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Grissom

customer_reviews.title: A great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lotion for extremely dry skin. Lasts for a long time and wonderfully moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice moisturizer and it really works for dry hands. I love this things now and have a big jar of it right by the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Clarie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! It smells great, it cruelty-free, very smooth and quick-drying on the skin, and for the amount of product you get, it's dirt cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is so soothing between hand washings. It smells lovely and the bottle is huge. My hands are so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion that isn't too oily and actually seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lotion that isn't too oily and actually seems to moisturize my skin. I keep a the big jug of it next to the sink and use some after I wash my hands, especially in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Top Busted Off Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that the bottle had the top busted and lotion was inside the shipping container
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lotion.
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is very silky feeling and long lasting. The scent is so subtle that it is great for men also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon  Customer

customer_reviews.title: It quickly melts into my dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema on my hands and this is the only option that combats the nastiness cause by this cold, dry winter season. Love the light scent and it doesnt leave a heavy layer.
customer_reviews.author: D Wise

customer_reviews.title: Issue Fixed
customer_reviews.text: 1st time using S/S and the lotions arrived busted, exploded and messy. Called Amazon to see how to handle the return and they were great. Sent replacements in 2 days, arrived without issue, will continue to use S/S.
customer_reviews.author: Deadwrong740

customer_reviews.title: Scent not great.  Only moderately moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: There is very little scent in this lotion and it is only moderately moisturizing. Taking it off of my Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C. Schaafsma

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic top of the pump was missing but other than that, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: michael romagnola

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked
customer_reviews.text: we like the product and have ordered several times. The time it was not wrapped in a protective bag and it leaked!!! Disappointing. Would guess lost over an ounce.
customer_reviews.author: Inky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cracked heels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cracked heels at a fraction of the price for foot cream.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Jergens Ultra Healing Dry Skin Moisturizer, 32 Ounce Body Lotion, for Absorption into Extra Dry Skin, with HYDRALUCENCE blend, Vitamins C, E, and B5
product_meta.description: Style:Ultra Healing Lotion| Size:32 Ounce (1 CT)Repair dryness at the source with Jergens Ultra Healing Moisturizer for Extra Dry Skin. The nourishing formula penetrates through five layers of skin to heal from within, improve tone and texture, and leave it smooth and visibly healthier. The formula absorbs quickly to soften areas that need the most moisture like heels, elbows, and knees. This body moisturizer, with a unique HYDRALUCENCE blend of ingredients plus Vitamins C, E, and B5, leaves your skin luminous and moisturized for up to 48 hours.
feature_bullets: Relief from dry skin – Jergens dry skin moisturizer helps to improve your skins natural tone and texture.
Extra dry skin lotion – Absorbs quickly into extra dry skin, including typically rough spots like heels, elbows, and knees.
Helps to repair dry skin – Penetrates five layers of skin to reduce dryness at the source.
Visibly healthier skin - With continual use of Jergens ultra-healing dry skin moisturizer, skin is nourished from within and looks visibly healthier over time.
Formulated with safe ingredients – Unique hydralucence blend of ingredients combined with vitamins C, E, and B5 leaves skin luminous.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
